channel.title: BattleScape Cleaned for PvP, by Team_Rocket
channel.description:
Like the title says, this is to be used as a PvP base, as it as a massive amount of NPC content removed. This will be our last release for the BattleScape source, as we're not cleaning it anymore. We're now improving and adding content into it.
Development Log: [url=http://pastebin.com/dVfLKDGj]12/13/2011 - Pest Control Class has been removed. - NpcDrops Class has - Pastebin.com[/url]
[IMG]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg694/scaled.php?server=694&filename=meida.jpg&res=medium[/img]
This also includes a Client compatible with BattleScape.
Release: [url=http://uppit.com/kaau75o9i8hf/~SRC.rar]Download ~SRC.rar @ UppIT[/url]
Credits:
98% - Palidino76 2% - Team_Rocket Development Team

item.title: BattleScape Cleaned for PvP, by Team_Rocket
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:13, topic:426117”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=528806.msg3857357#msg3857357 date=1324433207]
I think there’s a big difference between a regular BattleScape source and this one. You can read the Development Log and see that. I don’t understand why everyone is being so hostile. I’m just trying to contribute and improve the community.
[/quote]

  1. I’m talking about 10x calmer than I normally do because I have 2 weeks off now
  2. No one really needs nor uses Battlescape anymore, although they are nostalgic to veteran private server players, they don’t attract as much attention as other servers. Mostly because people would rather feel like their playing Runescape rather than be showered in customs. Also, most people have a cleaned Battlescape saved somewhere. I’m not saying you shouldn’t have released it, I’m just saying that there really is no need for it and that you’re not the first to release something like this.[/quote]

I apologize for mistaking your intentions. I’m completely aware that this Isn’t the first BattleScape release like this. Perhaps someone will find it useful.

Read full topic
item.source: BattleScape Cleaned for PvP, by Team_Rocket

item.title: BattleScape Cleaned for PvP, by Team_Rocket
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Team_Rocket:

I think there’s a big difference between a regular BattleScape source and this one. You can read the Development Log and see that. I don’t understand why everyone is being so hostile. I’m just trying to contribute and improve the community.

  1. I’m talking about 10x calmer than I normally do because I have 2 weeks off now
  2. No one really needs nor uses Battlescape anymore, although they are nostalgic to veteran private server players, they don’t attract as much attention as other servers. Mostly because people would rather feel like their playing Runescape rather than be showered in customs. Also, most people have a cleaned Battlescape saved somewhere. I’m not saying you shouldn’t have released it, I’m just saying that there really is no need for it and that you’re not the first to release something like this.

Read full topic

item.title: BattleScape Cleaned for PvP, by Team_Rocket
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:11, topic:426117”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=528806.msg3857275#msg3857275 date=1324430526]

If it has been released several times, then it has been leeched. This is my work, I am Team_Rocket on Rune-Server.

Battlescape has been cleaned a billion times, your not the first.

first post ftw?!?!

No one cares, get over yourself.

I never said I was the first to clean a BattleScape source. I was referring to this project in particular.
[/quote]
Their all battlescape, there’s hardly a difference…[/quote]

I think there’s a big difference between a regular BattleScape source and this one. You can read the Development Log and see that. I don’t understand why everyone is being so hostile. I’m just trying to contribute and improve the community.

Read full topic
